about_the_game: The soundtrack includes all mission loading tracks from the game, victory cues, the three action cues for puzzles, and a handful of bonus cues from Fuzoku Frame [18+]Soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexy girls, clothing, sexual acts.
It does not contains sexual violence, drug abuse, or self-harm.
All characters are over the age of 18.

detailed_description: The soundtrack includes all mission loading tracks from the game, victory cues, the three action cues for puzzles, and a handful of bonus cues from Fuzoku Frame [18+]Soundtrack
name: Fuzoku Frame [18+] Soundtrack
short_description: Immerse yourself into the world of Fuzoku Frame [18+] with the incredible original soundtrack. Fuzoku Frame [18+] original soundtrack includes all tracks for your listening pleasure. All tracks are provided in MP3 format
